CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 21, 1953, pg. 13, reads: "Modern Dance Class at YWCA - The new session of the Teen-Age Modern Dance Class of the Centre Avenue YWCA will begin Monday, March 30, and continue through June 8. The highlights of this session will be the preparation of a revue which is to be presented for parents and friends.  The class is limited to twenty participants, so registrations are being accepted now.  Left to right, above are, Dorothy Bradshaw, Angier Burleigh, Gwendolyn Wilmer, Joyce Hammond, Eleanor Bonner, instructor, and Letitia Averyth. - Harris Photo."Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 26, 1953, pg. 17, reads: "Dance Class - The Modern Dance Class meets the approval of these young employed women who feel the need of exercise to keep fit after long hours on the job."
TitMainTitle: Young women in modern dance class including Dorothy Bradshaw, Angier Burleigh, Gwendolyn Wilmer, Joyce Hammond, and Letitia Averyth, posed with two on floor, in YWCA
